column4: how do i turn on wifi i think i turned off the program managing it
What is the output of 'ps ax|grep nm-applet'?
1782 ? ssl 0:00 nm-applet --sm-disable 1945 pts/0 S+ 0:00 grep --color=auto nm--applet
Can you see the network icon in the notification area?
yes and the wireless card is listed under lspci
Does iwconfig show a wifi iface?
so i had both a usb and the pci because the usb was picking up a better signal and now both of them stopped working and theres no wifi option
What chipset is the PCI card?
im not sure whats the chipset is but the cards a netgear wg 3111t
Install the PCI card then run 'lspci' and tell us what chipset it actually is exactly
via technologies inc vt6102 rhine-II rev 74
See if the last post here helps http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=522260
and now when i plug in the usb the light that says it has power flashes on then after about a sec turns off when it used to be a steady green
In general, always assume that device LED's are completely meaningless
